channel.title: Few questions and help
channel.description:
1.)i wanna change the def req.'s for dragonhide like real RS but i wanna make bodys 1 def also. does anyone know the code and where to put it or anyone got an example code and where i should edit it?
2.)Also can i change the textures on Pimpscape Source? if so where and how ive seen TUTS about other sources but they had special folders
3.)Is there a way when i ::setobject 299 823 forexmaple that change it permanently somehow in my server folder? if so how and show me please
Ty for anyone that helps me with all of your knowledge about any of this, help is really really appreciated, who run it[br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 10:58:55 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Few questions and help

1.)i wanna change the def req.'s for dragonhide like real RS but i wanna make bodys 1 def also.
does anyone know the code and where to put it or anyone got an example code and where i should edit it?
